item.title: Photovolume
item.description: Nerd-girl loves her collinear crystal holographic storage device. Computers in Vekllei’s world are based on optical circuits. Their storage devices use patterns of light, marked in crystal wafers, to store thousands of terabytes of data (or what they call tetra, since they use ternary logic). You can read about Vekllei photovolumes here.
item.content:encoded:
Nerd-girl loves her collinear crystal holographic storage device.

Computers in Vekllei’s world are based on optical circuits.

Their storage devices use patterns of light, marked in crystal wafers, to store thousands of terabytes of data (or what they call tetra, since they use ternary logic). You can read about Vekllei photovolumes here.
